Title: Core Compressor Technology Recognized as “Internationally Advanced” — A Milestone in Rechi's Innovation Journey
Summary: On May 26, 2025, the China Electrical Equipment Industry Association successfully hosted the Scientific and Technological Achievement Appraisal Meeting for the “Key Technologies and Applications of Small Low-Noise, High-Efficiency, and Eco-Friendly Compressors.” After a rigorous evaluation by a panel of leading experts, Rechi's core compressor technology was officially recognized as having“reached the international advanced level.”

Title: Donating Heat Pump Water Heating System to Support Energy Upgrade at Hsinchu Ren'ai Children's Home
Summary: Hsinchu Ren'ai Children's Home has long provided care for orphaned and underprivileged children. However, its existing water heating system was energy-intensive and posed safety risks due to gas usage, creating an urgent need for replacement. RECHI proactively initiated a donation program and partnered with a local distributor to complete the installation, easing the organization's operational burden. The newly donated system was officially installed and commissioned in April 2025, enabling the children to grow up in a safer and more secure environment.
